attributes.action: David Cameron should focus on British
attributes.additional_details: The prime minister of Great Britain should focus more on the financial state of our own country, rather than giving aid to others when we need his attention most. He should also rule that immigrants from other countries should not be given benefits or free healthcare until they have worked in the UK for a longer period of time. We are in a recession and need his priority to be the UK - not any other country.
